name: Nexus Sites+
description: This script cleans up Fallout 3 Nexus,TESNexus, Dragon Age Nexus, and New Vegas Nexus by applying a centered width.
additional_info:
Update October 19, 2010: Updated to include New Vegas Nexus, changed the style name to Nexus Sites+, and a couple minor fixes.

Update June 21, 2010: Large update further improving compatibility with all the Nexus sites.

Update June 13, 2010: Updated for compatibility with new style and added Dragon Age Nexus.

Update Aug. 29, 2009: Minor readability update.

Update Jan. 31, 2009: Removed ad from server download page.

Update Feb 8, 2009: Made use of some blank space and worked out some padding issues.

Update Feb 13, 2009: Added TESNexus because they use the same CSS. Moved the tabs on the upper-right and repadded the Description, File, etc tabs just a tiny bit.
